column5: Hey guys, just wondering if anyone receives emails from Best Buy.  There was an email from Best Buy last night concerning "The Police" who will be coming to Toronto in July to perform at the ACC.  There is a unique pre-sale password in the email which I am looking to get.  If anyone received this email and are not planning to use the password, would you mind sending it my way.  I would need this password ASAP as it has to be used today. Thanks guys, Tracker Terry
just an FYI as I get advance notice on ACC concerts through a program at my work  The tickets I have access to are $238 each.  Yikes!!!

$238 ?????????  Holy crap!!!  Come on....I love the Police, but there's no way I'm paying those kinds of prices.  I paid $100 for Eagles tickets on their Hell Freezes Over tour and thought that was excessive.

Unfortuantly i will be paying full price, when the normal tickets go on sale. 2 Yrs ago i saw Sting play with Josh freese (a perfect circle drummer) and it was unbelieveable, sounded better than the Grammy performance thats 4 sure. B4 i went and saw them Sting had not played a Police tune in over 7yrs apparently and it was unbelieveable, they also played a day and a life by the beetles, good show.
BB1HMf254D and BB1T9teHyV i get the BB newsletter to 2 different email addy's
Thanks Phat, if I happen to get some tickets with your codes, I think a Bass Pro Shops Gift Card will be making its way to you!!! Greatly appreciated!!! Tracker Terry
On the news here this morning Toronto July 22nd.
no worries TT, no need to compensate either... just happy to help... and happy that the months of BB emails have been finally put to use LOL
I agree, finally a newsletter email with some substance!! Thanks again PB TT
